1_1EqT3ujyyX8n6yg3XNQCF2FmU2Nbgd8TQq.body: I think shred comes in a lot of distributions now. You can make it more agonizing by viewing the progress of the destruction with sudo dd if=/dev/urandom | pv | sudo dd of=/dev/sda
